panda_autograsp.grasp_planner¶

Implementation of the GQCNN grasp detection algorithm on the Franka Emika Panda Robots. This file is based on the grasp_planner_node.py file that was supplied with the GQCNN package.

Classes

GQCNNGrasp()

Class for storing the computed grasps.

GraspPlanner([model, sensor_type])

GraspPlanner class that interacts with a number of grasp detection algorithms to compute the optimal grasp.
class panda_autograsp.grasp_planner.GQCNNGrasp¶

Class for storing the computed grasps. This class is a trimmed down version of the original gqcnn.grasping.policy.policy.GraspAction.

property PARALLEL_JAW¶

PARALLEL_JAW Specifies parallel jaw gripper type information

property SUCTION¶

SUCTION Specifies suction jaw gripper type information

class panda_autograsp.grasp_planner.GraspPlanner(model='GQCNN-4.0-PJ', sensor_type='kinectv2')¶

GraspPlanner class that interacts with a number of grasp detection algorithms to compute the optimal grasp. Currently only the GQCNN by berkeleyautomation is supported.

__init__(model='GQCNN-4.0-PJ', sensor_type='kinectv2')¶
Parameters

  • cfg (str) – Name of the grasp detection model.

  • sensor_type (str) – The name of the RGBD sensor.

start()¶

Starts the sensor and the grasp planner request handler.

read_images(skip_registration=False)¶

Retrieves data frames from the sensor using the BerkeleyAutomation pylibfreenect2 <https://github.com/r9y9/pylibfreenect2> wrapper.

Parameters

skip_registration (bool) – If True, the registration step is skipped, by default False.

Returns

The ColorImage, DepthImage, and IrImage of the current frame.

Return type

tuple of ColorImage, DepthImage, IrImage, numpy.ndarray

Raises

RuntimeError – If the Kinect stream is not running.

plan_grasp()¶

Gets the image frames from the sensor and computes possible grasps.

Returns

Computed optimal grasp.

Return type

GQCNNGrasp

plan_grasp_bb(bounding_box=None)¶

Grasp planner request handler.

Parameters

bounding_box ([type], optional) – [description], by default None

Returns

Computed optimal grasp.

Return type

GQCNNGrasp

plan_grasp_segmask(segmask)¶

Grasp planner request handler.

Parameters

segmask (perception.BinaryImage) – Binary segmask of detected object

Returns

Computed optimal grasp.

Return type

py:class::.GQCNNGrasp

execute_policy(rgbd_image_state, grasping_policy, pose_frame)¶

Executes a grasping policy on an RgbdImageState.

Parameters

  • rgbd_image_state (RgbdImageState) – RgbdImageState from BerkeleyAutomation/perception to encapsulate depth and color image along with camera intrinsics.

  • grasping_policy (GraspingPolicy) – Grasping policy to use.

  • pose_frame (str) – Frame of reference to publish pose in.

panda_autograsp.grasp_planner.value¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)
